personal_details.name: Marco
personal_details.default_long_title: ECB Data Science Analyst, Part III Math Graduate, Data Enthusiast

cambridge.title: MASt in Pure Mathematics
cambridge.description_fixed:
\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=0.6cm, noitemsep, label={\textbullet}]
\item Also known as \href{https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Part_III_of_the_Mathematical_Tripos}{Part III of the Mathematical Tripos}.
\item Entry requirement is a 1st (or equivalent highest mark) from a good university, around 5 applicants for each student admitted.
\end{itemize}

torv.title: MSc in Pure and Applied Mathematics

awards.award1: \textbf{Start-up project} Between end of 2020 and early 2021 I invested a few months to work on a early-stage start-up idea with a Rome-based business accelerator
awards.award2: \textbf{INdAM Scholarship}, assigned through a national competition
awards.award4: Student at \textbf{Collegio Ghislieri}, 2nd in the admission competition  (room and board scholarship)
awards.award5: Former \href{http://olimpiadi.dm.unibo.it/}{\textbf{National Math Olympiads}} contestant (2x silver, 1x bronze)

Other IT: Scripting in Microsoft Windows and Linux
Software: Microsoft Office suite (including Word, Excel, Powerpoint)

code_samples.BradyseismMonitor: \textbf{Bradyseism Monitor}: ({\color{blue}\href{https://github.com/MarcoTamb/Phlegrean-Fields}{Github}}, {\color{blue}\href{https://campiflegrei-644a6eb36dd0.herokuapp.com/}{link}}) An interactive visualization, built with Dash, tracking the earthquakes in the Phlegrean Fields area, a large caldera near Naples, Italy
code_samples.AdventOfCode: \textbf{Advent of Code}: ({\color{blue}\href{https://github.com/MarcoTamb/AdventOfCode2023}{Github}}) My solutions to Advent of Code 2023, an annual programming challenges, happening every December
code_samples.Galerkin: \textbf{Galerkin method}: ({\color{blue}\href{https://github.com/MarcoTamb/Galerkin-Method-Report}{Github}}) A Jupyter report I had to produce for one of my exams at university, implementing a solver for PDEs
code_samples.CV: \textbf{CV Customizer}: ({\color{blue}\href{https://github.com/MarcoTamb/CV-Customizer}{Github}}) An interface I made to quickly adapt my resume for specific job ads, starting from a draft built with ChatGPT's API

publications.pub1: Special Purpose Entities in external statistics: the journey to data collection in Europe and first analytical insights, {\em manuscript in preparation},  J. Diz Diaz, F. Pastoris, C. Picon-Aguilar, M. Matteo, M. Tamburro
